name: metallurg-test-environment
description: Metallurgy test environment with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:deps: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm test
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:coverage:backend: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:backend:watch: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:watch
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:integration: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:integration
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && npx rimraf node_modules dist
scripts.clean:backend: cd server && npx rimraf node_modules dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npx rimraf node_modules
scripts.build:production: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
